articles.title: Aoki Lee Simmons, 21, Responds After Photos Of Her Kissing 65-Year-Old Restaurateur Go Viral - Essence
articles.description: People have had plenty to say about the fact that the Italian-American restaurant owner is just a year younger than her father, Russell Simmons.
articles.content: Aoki Lee Simmons, 21, is speaking out, in a coy way, after the model was seen sharing a kiss with restaurateur Vittorio Assaf, who is 65. Assaf is the successful founder of the Serafina Restaurant Gr… [+2141 chars]

articles.author: Brian Flood
articles.title: Solar Eclipse 2024: Fox Weather to offer special coverage with ‘America’s Total Eclipse’ - Fox News
articles.description: Fox Weather, which is FOX News Media’s free ad-supported streaming television (FAST) weather service, will offer coverage up to and throughout the solar eclipse on Monday.
articles.content:
Fox Weather will present special marathon coverage of Mondays solar eclipse with "Americas Total Eclipse," featuring correspondents and meteorologists across the nation.
